<<<<<<< HEAD
Attr.AllowedClasses
TYPE: lookup/null
VERSION: 4.0.0
DEFAULT: null
--DESCRIPTION--
List of allowed class values in the class attribute. By default, this is null,
which means all classes are allowed.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
=======
Attr.AllowedClasses
TYPE: lookup/null
VERSION: 4.0.0
DEFAULT: null
--DESCRIPTION--
List of allowed class values in the class attribute. By default, this is null,
which means all classes are allowed.
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
